th
St NW Washington D.C. 20009
Bachelor of Science in Journalism, University of Florida, Gainesville, Fla. (August, 2011)
Concentration in Business Administration
United Press International, Washington, D.C.
Content Marketing Manager, April 2015 – Present
• Implement online marketing and SEO strategies to increase web traffic.
• Collaborate with the Director of Digital Marketing in the management of site design,
development and advertising efforts.
• Create slideshows, listicles and blog posts based on news trends and original photos.
• Use Google Analytics to test visitor engagement and content placement and make
recommendations based on results.
• Oversee production of the home page, story pages and section pages.
• Ensure optimal use of all multimedia content on the site.
• Monitor site for problems and work with IT department to correct them.
• Collaborate with the editorial team in story selection.
• Contribute with social media and outreach efforts.
Trending Web Editor, July 2014 – April 2015
• Wrote ten stories per day for the site's trending section.
• Created viral content using trending keywords from search sites and social media.
• Used analytics to track popularity of items and created content based on results.
• Carried out all tasks for both the English and Spanish versions of the website.
• Doubled number of PPVs for UPI Español over a four-month period.
Web Producer, March 2012 – July 2014
Web-Marketing Intern, August 2011 - March 2012
The North Florida Herald, Gainesville, FL
Photojournalism Intern, April 2011 – August 2011
• Shot photos and video assignments to illustrate stories for print and the web.
INsite Magazine, Gainesville, FL
Design Intern, January 2011 – April 2011
• Designed page layout for INsite Magazine and the North Central Florida Business
Report Magazine at own discretion.
• Blogging.
• Proficient in Adobe In Design and Photoshop, Final Cut Pro & Photo Mechanic.
• Advanced digital, film, studio lighting and flash photography.
• Experience designing and creating content for social media and web pages.
• Fluent in Spanish, conversational French.
